monsterLanguages: Languages understands Auran and Common but speaks only through the use of its Mimicry trait
monsterSpecials: Ambusher. In the first round of a combat, the kenku has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised
Mimicry. The kenku can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 14 Wisdom (Insight) check.
monsterActions: Shortsword. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
Shortbow. Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
